alert.note: Alert for Coastal New Hanover; Coastal Pender; Inland New Hanover; Inland Pender (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 16 at 3:44PM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of New Hanover and southeastern Pender Counties through 430 PM EST... At 343 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Scotts Hill, or over Figure Eight Island, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Wilmington, Carolina Beach, Wrightsville Beach, Surf City, Snows Cut, Rich Inlet, South Masonboro Island, Figure Eight Island, Hampstead, Topsail Beach, Hightsville, Cape Fear Community College North Campus, Wilmington International Airport, Myrtle Grove, Murrayville, Masonboro, Castle Hayne, University Of North Carolina At Wilmington, Scotts Hill and Ogden. This includes the following highways... Interstate 40 between mile markers 412 and 416. Interstate 140 MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal New Hanover; Coastal Pender; Inland New Hanover; Inland Pender
